name: SUNSTYX
description:
A minimilistic shooter about destroying asteroids to keep a dying star alive.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 47 jam

theme was "stuck in a loop." The initial idea fit the theme rather well, but as per usual I ended up straying into a focus on the aspects of that idea that don't really fit the theme any better than most games would. Your movement is restricted to rotation, other than that, well... oops.
